attributes.action: Reconsider the decision to cancel outside Junior sport on mental health grounds.
attributes.additional_details:
To consider the effect on young peoples mental and physical health that will be diminished by cancelling outside sport.

Children will be able to play sport at school but will not be able to train with their friends at the weekend.

This makes no sense whatsoever.
attributes.background: Allow junior sport to continue outside at weekends.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557785
